articles.title: ‘Uncharted’ Review: Tom Holland Stars in Bland Video Game Movie Less Cinematic Than Its Source Material - IndieWire
articles.description: Video game movies used to be bad because games didn't give movies enough to work with — now they’re bad because movies aren't able to keep up.
articles.content: It used to be that video game movies were bad because video games didn’t give movies enough to work with; say what you will about Annabel Jankel and Rocky Morton’s “Super Mario Bros.,” but they had t… [+7811 chars]
